name: KGB Hacker
description:
KGB Hacker is a simple text based code breaker game. Containing 10 levels, 9 are randomized as you progress.

You'll play as a field operative code named Veni.
Morior Invictus your buddy back at HQ is helping you hack into the KGB Servers to retrieve secret files.

Can you beat all 10 levels?

System Requirements:
VS C++ Redistributable 2015 or higher.
Windows x64 bit 
~ 0.3 MB storage
~ 0.3 MB RAM

Github for the code:
https://github.com/OutbackGames/KGB-Hacker
